column4: i getting an error downloading a package for Hoary: Failed to fetch http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/main/g/glib2.0/libglib2.0-0_2.6.0-0ubuntu1_i386.deb  Bad header line
Check your internet connection... seems to work for me.
i can download it manually, but not via apt-get
can i copy it manually to some directory ?
Yes you can... download it somewhere, then run dpkg -i blabla.deb
where are all .deb store, that apt-get uses ?
